MEANING: a piece of work involving careful study of a subject over a period of time, done by school or college students
an object with a round folding frame of long, straight pieces of metal covered with material, that you use to protect yourself from the rain or from hot sun
a building for people to live in, usually for one family
an occasion when people buy and sell goods; the open area or building where they meet to do this
a university teacher of the highest rank
the bad feeling that you have when you are in danger or when a particular thing frightens you
used at the beginning of a letter before the name or title of the person that you are writing to
